Package index

All functions

blackjack_score()
Score a Blackjack Hand
c(<card>)
Combine card vectors with c()
card()
Create a card vector
card_rank()
Extract the rank (value) of a card
card_suit()
Extract the suit of a card
deck_cards()
Create a Blackjack Deck
deal_hand()
Deal a Hand of Blackjack Cards
is_face_card()
Is this card a face card (J, Q, or K)?
is_soft_17()
Check if Dealer Has a Soft 17
print(<blackjack_game>)
Print a Blackjack Game Summary
simulate_blackjack_game()
Simulate a Multiplayer Game of Blackjack
